object.name: cut
object.property: python:checkPermission("Delete objects", plone_context_state.parent()) and checkPermission("Copy or Move", object) and not plone_context_state.is_portal_root()

object.name: rename
object.property: python:checkPermission("Delete objects", plone_context_state.parent()) and checkPermission("Copy or Move", object) and checkPermission("Add portal content", object) and not plone_context_state.is_portal_root()

object.name: delete
object.property: python:checkPermission("Delete objects", plone_context_state.parent()) and not plone_context_state.is_portal_root()
